I  read that Atarax can also exacerbate these symptoms and that it's not meant long term usage so I've weaned myself off it .

Side Effects: Was originally to help w/ itch from hives. I have insomnia and WOW this drug has made such a difference. Doctor prescribed two scripts of it during my 1 month of hives. Just taking one a night until I run out and it helps immensely just getting me to sleep. I just need that extra help falling asleep. I'd say it helps with sleep quality as well. Very satisfied.
Comments: I had zero side effects other than the purpose the drug was created.

Side Effects: It complements the Klonopin. So be prepared to get deep long hours of sleep. Like 12 hr. plus.
I did take the anxiety away only because it knocked me out. Made me feel so drunk and when i woke up i had the worst hangover like symptoms.

sedative effect upon talking- however the best medication by far I have ever been described. I cannot rate it enough. if having an allergy flare up_ the tablet works within ten minutes and I am symptomless. Also calms me right down when feeling anxious. I suspect this drug is not for everybody. But I would suggest definitely worth a try. WONDER DRUG!
Could not wake up_ sleepy the whole day_ could not concentrate on work due to sleepiness. Woke up feeling light headed_ like a hangover.
Drowsiness_ palpitations.makes me sweat with 20mg. real sensitive to anything!
Confussion _ drowsy_ i felt "high"

Loss of appetite_ feel drowsy and unable to focus on daily tasks.can make you sleepy but with some auditory problems at night.these may pass with time.was taking loratadine before which increased appetite but atarax there is loss of appetite. Suppose I will lose weight which is good! But I enjoy my food so bad:(
diarrhea_ vomiting confused with gastro-enteritis_ no sleeping enhancive_ occulaire adjustments_ blurred vision_ state of confusion_ itchy dermatitis
Comments: I knew that I was Atarax non-responsive (as well as one of my son's).  We could drink an entire bottle and not experience any benefit to our problems.  We would only be stuck with the side effects.  I knew that if Atarax had no effect within the 24 hours following the initial dose_ to stop it right away.  I'm a doctor_ but that had no effect on my treatment. I pleaded with the psychiatrists to stop giving me Atarax (because it was the only meds that they put me on)_ but they refused_ so I was stuck on it_ until I played the game_ and told them that I was much better_ and they let me go.  My whole body has become a playground for Atarax.  I'm now taking enormous doses of Lasilix to evacuate the Atarax_ and slowly having my bipolar meds reintroduced.

Side Effects: Mood swings_ drowsiness_ lack of motivation_ complete detachment_ minor hallucinations.Vivid nightmares at night.
Drowsiness_ allergic reaction
Comments: Was prescribed this to fight anxiety_ and it worked pretty well.Problem is_ I had severe allergic reactions to Atarax (red eye) each time I took it.Won't use this again.

Side Effects: Terrible nightmares_ anterograde amnesia_ excessive drowsiness_ inability to focus/concentrate_ auditory hallucinations_ "hangover" feeling up to 15 hours after consumption_ in instances where the medication did not make me fall asleep within one hour... aggressiveness/mood changes often occurred
Comments: This medication makes it difficult for me to carry on basic functions_ such as concentrating and left me feeling that something was wrong/missing... I've had days where I took it for three days and mentally I lost more than a week. Often sleep 10-15 hours within 24 hours of consumption.

Side Effects: My sons hives only go away with this med. It makes him sleepy. I've tried it and it puts me straight out. It would be a safe but sleepy alternative to anxiety.
Sleepy_ but that was good because my itchy rash was severe.   The rash had kept me awake.

I was actually prescribed Atarax syrup to take to help treat anxiety and sleeplessness that I was experiencing. This syrup smells awful_ tastes_ awful_ and all this medicine did was upset my stomach. If you have bad anxiety problems along with insomnia and a doctor tries to prescribe you this stuff_ just say no! I sure which I had. It's too weak to help with anxiety and not strong enough either to help with insomnia at any level.
Comments: Not worth trying!

Side Effects: I have taken atarax since I was in secondary school year 9. It has been a very good drug for me but it makes me drowsy but only when I take it sometimes if I take regularly the I don't get drowsy. It helps a lot calms my skin down if itchy. I would recommend this to exzeema who suffers from a lot of itching.going abroad to hot countries also helps. I was the worse case bandages being hospitalised and the lot if you are bad then get dr to refer you to st Thomas hospital in Westminster it is one of the best hospitals with all the good doctors in dermatology. My daughter had exzeema aswell by taking her to a hot country Pakistan really cured her exzeema. I'm still taking atarax but only if needed and no more scratching at nights for me cause I'm partially cured in not as bad I used to be. I hope this helps.

Drowsiness and suppressed feelings at first. Really helped with anxiety. I just quit cold turkey a few days ago and now I am constantly itching all over my body. I know this medicine also treats itching so was wondering if it suppressed my itching even though I didn't need it for that and now that I'm done with it my body is going through withdrawal and itching a lot? Would really love to know if anyone else has experienced itching when they stopped taking it and didn't take it for itching in the first place
mild sedation
Comments: definitely not a sleeping pill for me_ but the anti-anxiety effect is similar to a k-pin (without taking yet another benzo)...worth sticking it for awhile

Side Effects: I was first given a shot of Visteril at hospital after a week of predisone (20 mg)and my hives were returning. I was pissed they gave it to me_ I felt like I could barely walk and I had to drive home. The initial effect wore off then I was wide awake all night (shot was at 7pm) I filled the script the next day_ took it one day_ still had the loopy feeling at first then decided to quit taking it. Two days later I quit the prednisone. I had horrible muscle pains_ bouts of depression and anxiety_ chest pains_ ringing in my ears_ nausea_ no appetite and lost 9lbs in a week. I thought it was all due to the prednisone_ then tried the visteril again after a week off the prednisone and didn't get the severe loopy feeling so I thought it was because of the prednisone. It helped with the itch due to hives coming back in full force but now after reading all the side effects from others on here. I can honestly say what I thought was prednisone withdrawal is now from the visteril. I even last week got a script for 25 mg of attarax. Took it last week up until yesterday. Then decided to quit taking them. I have severe muscle tension_ zaps in my back_ head and calfs_ only 4 hours of sleep and still wide awake. Alot of nervousness and worry. I would really like to know of these symptoms will work themselves out. I can say I would rather be up all night putting cold copresses on hives than deal with these side effects. It may help some with anxiety but don't take it if you didn't because it'll
Memory loss
Helped me sleep but felt groggy in the mornings & couldn't stop eating - put on 10 pounds over 2 months!! Stopped taking them & my appetite has returned to normal.
Best nights sleep I ever had but felt tired and depressed all the next day.  I lost my desire to exercise and experienced a significantly increased appetite.
Comments: Without medication I normally have terrible interrupted sleep_ so i tried Atarax.  With 50mg one hour before bed I slept for 10 hours but didn't want to get up.  I felt tired and depressed all day and ate 50% more than I usually do.  I discontinued the Atarax after 2 days so I can't say if the bad side effects would have reduced.

Side Effects: Worked well for a couple of months then started to get reflux within 30mins of taking it which made my anxiety worse!
Comments: I initially started on 10mg and had to up the dose every 8 weeks as it would become less effective. Eventually decided to stop as I didn't want to keep going up.

Side Effects: Just make me tired_ for the first time but now_ am fine
None
Comments: When I read your comments I felt like I should stop taking this medicine. But looking back_ I see that Atarax helped me a lot with the skin rash and pruritis_ although these symptomes appear only when I am awake and don't disturb my sleeping behavior as well as Atarax. Do I recommend it? of course yes_ but just for a short period and not in an exessive way. Try to find out why you can't sleep in stead of handing the problem to Atarax. Good luck to all!!

Reason: I was taking Atarax for anxiety.
Side Effects: I am going to try and explain in my own words what this new "pill" that I was going to be taking was supposed to help me with. Ok I guess when I committed my self to the hospital they started me on Atarax. I wasn't ever even told I was put on a nrw medication. When I found that out I was kind of upset. I thought to myself what did they put me on? But at that time it was working. So I said to my doctor well I guess_its working. Because when I first started the new pill it was working. Ok so then I was feeling good with Atarax. Then after I got out of being watched while I was taking it. Got out of the hospital I felt fine. Then it started that whatever that this med. Was the I just started taking was different. This new med was not the same. It made me laugh that new pill Atarax it made me sit there from the first I took it to my friends that were nice people I thought and that pill was not that right medication for me.  I would take it and then I would loose it. I would sit there a laugh about nothing. If this happen to anyone else please let me know
Drowsiness (which was the point)_ difficulty waking up in the morning
Comments: I love Atarax. I am taking it for a severe itch that no doctor has been able to figure out. I've been itching for 6 months now_ and wasn't able to sleep at night because the itch was so extreme_ I'd wake up in tears after less than an hour of sleep. With the help of atarax_ I'm able to get a full night's sleep. Waking up is difficult_ but I'd rather have that problem than the itchiness and lack of sleep. Unfortunately_ until they figure out why I'm itching and find a way to fix it for sure_ I'm going to be taking these on a nightly basis.

Side Effects: groggy_ sleepy_ trouble concentrating_ headaches_ increase in appetite_ 25 MG did nothing but 50MG knocked me out and left it hard to wake up
Comments: did not relieve anxiety

Side Effects: None
Comments: Have suffered with horrible seasonal allergies. I made an appointment with an allergist for testing. I'm off the charts for seasonal allergies and indoor dust mites. She prescribed Nasonex along with irrigating my sinuses once a day in the morning. I also covered my mattress and pillows with protective covers to prevent dust mites. She also prescribed Atarax for bedtime. It works fantastic. I've never had a better night's sleep and I feel great in the morning. Wonderful drug!

Hoping to dispel misinformation. 7 days ago I had a bad food allergic rxn. Bottom of my feet to the top of my head_ worst on torso.  Was prescribed Atarax + 40mg Prednisone/day.  First 24 hrs: no change. After reading on sites like this about people having hives disappear in 24 hrs on Atarax_ I started to worry. Even doubled up on the Atarax dose once.  48 hrs: went back to the doctor because my experience wasn't matching what I saw on the internet (this is why health care costs are rising).  The (2nd) doctor explained two important things: First_ ATARAX DOES NOT MAKE HIVES GO AWAY FASTER. It only helps with the itchiness_ and if I didn't need it for that_ I should stop taking it. I confirmed this with the pharmacist.  Second_ the only things that DO make hives disappear is a) Prednisone and b) time.  I stopped taking the Atarax at that point. End of the third day: started seeing real_ substantial fading_ especially on my extremities. Days 4-5: people wouldn't notice the marks unless I pointed them out. Day 6-7: pinkness barely noticeable everywhere except my chest (because of the sheer quantity that had been there). I liken the recovery time to that for acne. Hope this helps someone! Vowed I'd come back and follow up_ unlike people posting "just started_ hope this works" and never reporting back. Take your Prednisone_ be patient_ and don't take extra Atarax unless you need it for the itching. Good luck to all!

Side Effects: Great sleeps - longer than usual; 7 - 8 hours.  Wild_ good_ dreams - consistently.  Groggy in the morning_ but not for very long.
Comments: I can't see anything wrong with this drug! But I wonder if it's addictive and fear having to stop using it.  It was prescribed for nighttime itching and eczema. But when I told doc that I also suffered from insomnia_ she thought this was a good choice for me. I am happy with it_ but don't want to get addicted!

Side Effects: drowsinessvery recently splitting headache and nausea (3 days after withdrawal)
Comments: i started with 25 mg tab 1/day 7 years ago for autoimmune urticaria. after 2 months_ the hives were managed and the itch was less. over the years_ i started to taper the dose from 1 tab to 1/2 tab_ until 1/4 tab as prescribed by the doctor. and ive been on the 1/4 tab dose for 3 years and the hives almost never appeared. 3 days ago i stopped taking it to check whether hives would appear_ now on the 3rd day im not sure whether this splitting headache and nausea are withdrawal symptoms. anyone experienced the same?

Side Effects: Mostly drowsiness. Occasionally dizziness_ vivid dreams_ a little hyper for 1-2 hours after taking a dose.  Once my body became used to the medicine (about a week) I didn't notice side effects much_ anymore.
Comments: I'm not sure it's helping the angioedema (which doesn't come and go; it's been pretty constant) - the side effects are MUCH easier for me to handle than claritin and it makes me less drowsy than benadryl.  I'm pretty sensitive to medications_ but my experience with atarax has been a good one so far.  It's also helped with underlying anxiety even though I'm on a fairly low dosage.  If my anxiety gets worse_ I would be willing to take a higher dose of atarax to treat it because this does not cause dependency like some other anxiety meds I've tried in the past.

Side Effects: drowsiness_ bloating of face_ weight gain

I am facing itching problem form past 2 years. If i take 10mg of atarax there will be no itching for next 2 days. Again the itching starts after 2 days and repeat the same. I am taking it form past 2 years. till now i didnt face any issue. Please anyone can you tell me is there any side effects if i continue taking ATARAX. Or is there any other way to stop itching. Please help...
Comments: I am facing itching problem form past 2 years. If i take 10mg of atarax there will be no itching for next 2 days. Again the itching starts after 2 days and repeat the same. I am taking it form past 2 years. till now i didnt face any issue. Please anyone can you tell me is there any side effects if i continue taking ATARAX. Or is there any other way to stop itching. Reason: sever anxiety n i mean bad
Side Effects: None
Made me drowsy (but I took it at nite) but  I slept well and longer than usual_ around 9-10 hrs). I did have a nightmare that nite_ maybe a coincidence.
Comments: After a first time bout of hives lasting on and off for about 7 weeks_ and finding only minimal relief from Benadryl_ oatmeal baths_ calamine etc._  I got a prescription for 10 mg of Atarax. I took it once and slept through the night without staying awake from intense itching. The next morning I felt a touch groggy but so grateful to not have any itching. I did not take another dose because there was no renewed itching and the size of the existing hives on my body was starting to shrink.  I did not get any new hives after this first dose.  Am keeping my fingers crossed_ it has been almost 72 hrs since that dose and I have not needed to take it again.

Side Effects: Nothing for over 40 years (other than drowsiness) then post menopause_ its drying effect was bad on my complexion.  So I stopped cold turkey OMG!
Comments: For a few months after stopping abruptly (an idiot move in retrospect) last April_ the insomina was horrid for a few months.  That resolved.  But what's followed has been a nightmare.  The ringing in my years is so noteworthy_ I have to attempt to talk over it.   I never had anxiety before (a mental brick) now I feel close to panic for no reason. I'll wake up with dread. My resting pulse rate has gone from around 65 to 120 (that's upon waking!).   My heart will pound_ my pulse will roar through my extremities_ throbbing unmercifully. I can go on_ but you get the idea.  It was so bad_ I had all my hormone levels checked.   I had a thyroidectomy in the early '60s so I watch that regularly and take dessicated natural hormone replacement.   Over 9 moths later_  blood levels are all normal_ and clearly I am not. I have no other underlying health issues.  How long will this last?! (the rhetorical cry of the damned)  I'm wondering whether to start back on a very low dose (like splitting the pills to 2 or 5 mg) but I'd rather not.    I'll watch this site for any signs of encouragement (OK_ that may be wishful thinking-- even documented discouragement will do.)  I can't find anything to replicate my experience online. Thanks.

Side Effects: Severe Tiredness sleeping up to 12 hours a night and still tired during the day. Weight gain of 6 pounds. Dizziness and rash. Heaviness in chest.

I do not think this drug should be used by any kids under 5 as it seems to  reduce the brain wave patterns which could effect learning in kids who are not suffering from anxiety. Does it slow development in normal kids taken it for itch.
Comments: This drug in my opinion "Should be categorized as a chemical mind alter drug and not a antihistamine" something that might actually reduce normal kids ability to make the grades in grade school. Ex. Have your child off it for 3 weeks toss them simple puzzles to put together watch and time. Now put them back on and do the same thing and puzzles and be shocked for yourself.

Side Effects: i have had no side affects whilst taking this_ i think it is brilliant. Although i am supposed to take 50mg in the morning and the same at night but i go straight to sleep within half an hour so i can only take them of the night.
Comments: i fall asleep half an hour after taking the tablets so i tend to just take 2 tablets (50mg total)of a night. if i forget to take them i spend the whole day very agitated and tense_ i had never suffered with Anxiety prior to taking these. however they are brilliant with my allergies so i cant complain.

Side Effects: wieght loss_ moody_ head aches_ emotional
Comments: im 14. and every 1 thinks I have  anxiety problem so they put me on this. But I dont think I have an anxiety problem and I dont know whether to take the medicine and shut my mouth or to stop taking it.

Side Effects: I"ve been taking this medication since I was 13 years old.  Initially I experienced weight gain and grogginess.  Now the only side effect is a small amount of grogginess so I take it at night.
Comments: Atarax has changed my life. I have dermatographic/dermagraphic skin_ which mean your body constantly produces too much histamine.  It is hereditary in my family.  I have other family members on it as well_ including my 21 year old son.  This drug has definitely been a life saver.

Side Effects: None yet
Comments: Dermatologist prescribed Atarax for my son who suffers from severe eczema to help ease the intense itching. He would wake up in the middle of the night and itch so bad there would be blood on his sheets_ nails_ clothes_ etc. So far it has made him able to sleep without itching which in return is making the open wounds from itching ALOT clearer. Hopefully it keeps working along with the prescribed creams and his eczema can be a thing of the past :)

Side Effects: Drowsiness; nightmares on the first 2 nights. Lots of muscular pain. Feels like my fibromyalgia is back in full swing. Bad copper taste in mouth.
Comments: This drug has proven helpful in reducing the symptoms of the hives and itching. Its early days yet so I am hoping the side effects would wear off. Today not as bad as yesterday_ so am looking on the positive side.

Side Effects: Bad taste
dry mouth_couldnt sleep at all_my joints ached severly and made my fybromyalsia 10 times worse!and gained 10 pounds in one month.
very sleepy_ nightmares/daymares
Comments: im not one to have nghtmares or anything of the sort. but since ive began the medicine it helps calm me down but i also have bad nightmares.

Side Effects: Took for 2 yrs with increasing tiredness and groggy feeling_ but helped with ic symptoms.  Then began having tremors_ muscle twitching_dropping things_ numb fingers.
Comments: Was referred to neurosurgeon who was considering neck surgery_ but turns out to be caused by atarax. Stopped taking 5 months ago with no improvement.  Arms so weak_ can't do daily tasks.

Side Effects: It does make you a bit sleepy.  But the worst side effect was the gastritis that resulted.  That's inflammation of the lining of the stomach and means at least 6 weeks of Nexium type drugs.  It is very painful.
Comments: I looked up the side effects of Atarax and sure enough_ there was gastrointestinal distress...and that's what I have now.  I will not take this drug again even though it helped with the vestibulitis.  I found that the herb Valerian root capsules works just as well with no side effects_ take at bedtime and sleep like a baby. I did not take Atarax for a straight 200 and some days...I actually only took it when the auto-immune problem flared up_ so it was off and on for almost a year.

Side Effects: I stopped taking  atarax_ and I notice that all my arthritis type symptons are gone. I would take at night before bed_ and wake up each day with seems like so many joints aching. It owuld take half the day to begin to feel better. Now Two nights without it and no joint aches. Is this a true sympton of this drug_ because emotionally it has helped me so much and also with my allergies..thank you
Comments: Would like very much to continue to take but..tha joint pain does seem to be related to this 10 Mg pill

Side Effects: While taking it: Dry mouth_ severely chronically exhausted_ nightmares_ insomnia_ muscle cramps_ joint pain_ severe depression_ moodiness_ memory loss_ rapid heart beat. Even years after getting off of it: Always extremely tired even after getting plenty of sleep_ joint pain so bad as to make me limp at times_ memory loss_ moodiness_ muscle cramps so bad as to make it hard to sleep_ lack of concentration_ anxiety_ my son was born with half a heart.
Comments: After my son was born with Right Atrial Isomerism (half a heart) I started looking into this drug that I had been on for about nine year of my own child hood and had not taken it for about 5 years before I got pregnant (I had even done a very extensive purification program after getting off of it) and found another person who was also on it long term also had several kids born with birth defects_ one of her's even died from it.  My exhaustion/tiredness is so severe that even after 8-10 hours sleep I feel like all I can confront doing is going back to sleep. If any of you anticipate using this drug DONT!!!! And if you are on it now get off now before you get the long term effects!!!

Side Effects: Increase in appetite
Comments: I take other medication in addition to this_ one of them being  oxycodone 15 mg. Atarax does not make me tired_ sleepy_ dazed_ calm my anxiety or anything. I think my body has a high tolerance for sedating medication. I even took 100 mg at night time and I was still up for hours.

Side Effects: Sleepiness
Comments: I take this medicine at night so that the side effect is actually a little helpful.  I take this medicine as part of a three drug cocktail for Interstitial Cystitis (Amitriptyline_ Hydroxyzine and Pentosan Polysulfate).  Other than the sleepiness_ I have had no other side effect.

Side Effects: hangover_grogginess_unclear thinking
Comments: Initially worked well to improve the quality of my sleep; after a while_ however_ I noticed that I'm always groggy_ tired_ and listless while taking this medicine-even after a full nights sleep. I normally sleep 8 hours-with this drug I sleep 10 hours and still don't feel energetic.

Side Effects: Slightly drowsy for the first few days. I seem to not be able to sleep through the night very well although when I do sleep_ I sleep well and feel like I am fully refreshed upon wakeing.
Comments: I always had a problem with extreme sweating in situations that made me feel slightly anxious. I've also had to use a fast acting inhaler for weezing all the time. I workout often and workout hard. I am very healthy. My doc prescribed me Atarax 10mg and so far_ this has almost been a miracle drug for me. I now rarely weeze for no reason_ allergies are not bothering me_ My sweating has been reduced to basically nothing (unless physically induced)_ and I am waaay more comfortable in most situations as the Anxiety is almost disapeared. As I've said above_ I workout often and watch my weight_ along with other aspects of my body closley. The weight gain some are contributing to Atarax_ I have personally not experienced. Considering I smoke weed as well_ the hunger people claim this induces_ has been nothing I have noticed either. I have noticed I pee more and I am thirsty a little more when taking Atarax though. Maybe it's my higher protein diet_ or a combination_ but I have also noticed being slightly more gassy as well. It made me worry when I read people contributed weight gain to this medicine and possibly it's different for everyone but I am a firm believer that the weight gain is more so due to personal lack of motivation/will power or another drug.

Side Effects: At first made me very sleepy and I slept good on it_ but last time I took it_ I stayed awake all night long and all night the next day_ today I'm hoping it will wear off.  Also_ there was muscle spasms_ jerks_ and twitches combined with general restlessness that night.
Comments: I hate it so much.  Don't take this stuff_ just scratch yourself or use topical medicines.

Side Effects: Weight Gain(~4 lbs every month)_ extremely increased appetite(was eating 3000+ calories when only 1500 is required)_ racing heart_ sleeo the first two days after starting the medication
Comments: Although I love atarax for what it does to my hives_ I cannot stand its side effects. Every year_ after my seasonal allergies end and I get off atarax_ I have to start exercising twice as much to take the extra fat off my body. I am a very skinny person by default and eat very healthy normally but when I'm on atarax_ its like my body has a mind of its own. I get extremely hungry every two hours and eat crazy amounts of food. I don't think gaining 12-15 pounds every year and losing it in the next few months can be healthy for my body. And I'm talking about 15% gain in weight...its nothing to sneeze at.Aside from all the crazy side effects_ this drug does work wonders on my hives unlike any other anti-histamines like benadryl or claritin. One curious thing after getting off atarax this year was I lost my appetite. It's been going for a few days now....let's see how long it lasts.

Side Effects: sleepyness_ dizzy_ weight gain - 8 lbs in 4 months
Comments: After taking it_ the itching stopped for several hours. one pill was often enough. when the itching was real bad_ I took two of them_ day or night. I was able to work but had to have coffee in the afternoon so that I wouldn't fall asleep. I stopped taking it because of the weight gain.

Side Effects: Dry mouth the first few nights_ some daze
Comments: Very good cure for insomnia and nervous excitability. It is very safe has little side effects. It's cheap and efficient recommend to all who have probelmy sleep or anxiety. Working 30 minutes after dosing for approximately 8 hours.I took him even as a child when I had periods of depression in their bipolar illness.In poland costs $ 5 per pack 30 tablets 10mg but the best is in syrup because you can individually choose whether or not the dose to the child.

Side Effects: DROWSINESS_ BUT IT STATES 'MAY CAUSE DROWSINESS'.
Comments: IT CURED THE HIVES QUICKLEY.  HAVEN'T HAD A REOCCURENCE SINCE 28 MAR 2003

Side Effects: This medication upon first use stays in your system for quite a while.  Effects are extreme sleepiness_ had a difficult time getting up the next morning_ arms and legs completely lifeless.  Can you say real bad nightmares when taking this stuff?  That may go away after continued usage.  I was in a fog the next day after taking this the night before.
Comments: For individuals with moderate pain not requiring opiate based pain killers I think atarax would be a great sleep aid.  No way you would combine this medicine with vicoden at night_ may not wake up the next day.

Side Effects: Extreme drowsiness_ some periods of insomnia_ extremely vivid nightmares_ auditory hallucinations_ paranoia_ emotiona apathy_ lack of energy_ lack of motivation
Comments: This is the only anti-histimine that has been effective for me - I *cannot* take Benedryl in any form.

Side Effects: Drowsiness and that becomes more tolerable with exposure.Resting hand tremor in very high doses (125mg/day)
Comments: Atarax changed my life. I had a disfiguring skin allergy and the most intense itching_ even in sleep. I'd been to many dermatologists and tried everything to no avail. Atarax relived the itching to the point I could completely recover. At my highest pt I was on 125mg daily. Now I take it for maintaince only when symptoms develop and I've not had a recurrance of anything that level in two years. An added benefit for an insomiac like myself is that it can be counted on as a sleeping pill as well. I don't know what I would have done if I'd never found it.

Side Effects: increased heart rate_ sensitivity to sound_ lack of motivation_ sensory hallucinations (scary)_ easily startalled_ presence of people not there_ sore throat that passed with time_ dry mouth and bad breath_ increased body temperature after taking_ muscle twitches_ agitation_ memory problems (bigtime)_ urinary retention_ dysphoria_ my eyes pop open at night and can't sleep but my mind is going strong along with my feet and picking at my fingers
Comments: i'm not lying when i say i had all those side effects_ i was on elavil too and thought it was the elavil_ the 'tripping on acid' feeling didn't go away after the elavil stopped and i figured it was from the atarax_ turns out both are anticholinergics and as you can see_ i must have a problem with anticholinergics_ yay me_ frustrated.  started at 50 mg at bedtime (asked dr. for lowest dose--turns out they make 10 mg--thx doc!)_ took 25mg last night and still feel trippy and up all night_ wonderful...sigh.  this was a substitute for klonopin by my psych at one time and i said 'no'.  i should have listened to myself.  i almost went to the hospital last night b/c of this! i didn't go b/c i thought there was nothing they could do...turns out there is a drug to counter the anticholinergic effects...thank goodness for the internet...no wonder drs. hate the internet...people are more informed now!!!!

Side Effects: drowsiness was tolerable_ lessened after 1st week. Now after 4months I realized I am steadily gaining weight - 3 lbs/month despite dieting and exercise. I have never gained weight like this!!
Did not work at all
Comments: 100Mg

Side Effects: Weight gain_ intense pain in calf muscles_ headaches.
Comments: Atarax was great at taking away my skin allergies_ they are fully gone but as a result_ I have on-going intense pain in my calf muscles to the point I can't stand sometimes.

Reason: itching_ bad allergy to dust mites
Side Effects: Made me very sleepy_ my body at least_ not so much my mind_ I went to sleep but woke up about half an hr later with whole-body tremors originating in my chest about once a second_ my mind was awake but my body was too fatigued to do anything like tell someone symptoms.  It also made me very nauseaus.  It's about 20 hrs after taking the one pill_ but I'm still very nauseaus and barely have the energy or motivation to not just sit here_ stare_ and drool.  I'm feeling very out of it_ and any amount of movement makes me feel short of breath. I'm about to call the doctor to see if I should be concerned this isn't going away.
Comments: this cure is far worse than the symptoms it was prescribed for

Side Effects: Dry mouth the first two nights_ deceased snoring.
Comments: my wife got a happy bouns when I started in on this drug.  my snoring decreased so much she doesn't have to wait for me to fall asleep to come to bed.  the itching went away in the first week and has not returned.  we were not sure if it was the drug that stopped the snoring so i quit taking it but have returned to it since.

Side Effects: drowsiness
Comments: Had my first ever onset of hives 5 days and ago & bendrayl and clartin did not help it got worse to the point I was scratching myself raw. Doctor put me on Atarax yesterday (10-20 mg every 4-hours_ 30 mg total yesterday). I woke up this morning after a restful sleep and noticed a dramatic decrease in the size_ bumpiness and itchiness of the hives. Still a bit itchy but infinitely better.  I took a 10 mg pill at the start and near end of work today and felt slightly fuzzy in the head_ but not sleepy. Don't think I would do well at work if I took more_ but 20mg helped me not itch and scratch all day. Started on a 7 day taper today of prednisone to help with the hives_ which I HATE b/c pred gives me insomnia but the doctor said taking 20mg of Atarax before bed should conteract it_ so I'm optimistic my hives will be gone soon and my sleep won't be ruined by prednisone as it usually is.

Side Effects: Fatigue_ 'dead' feeling emotionally_ low energy_ PAINS IN HIP JOINTS AND CALF MUSCLES
Comments: I started taking Atarax because I read that it helps bladder pain due to interstitial cystitis. I noticed that it helped insomnia and it works very well for this. Because of MCS (multiple chemical sensitivities)_ especially to wood smoke_ I have allergic brain reactions that trigger out-of-control crying jags and rage_ as well as profound depressions that can border on suicidal. I spent thousands of dollars on psychotherapy before discovering that all I had to do was take an antihistamine and I'd be fine. For this_ Atarax as well as Benadryl work wonderfully well. However_ the price I pay is the side effects I listed.  I thought I had arthritis until I figured out that the pains come and go according to whether I have taken Atarax or not. The more Atarax I've taken_ the worse the pain_ sometimes almost crippling. I have the same reactions to Benadryl and have entered these comments on the Benadryl page as well.

Side Effects: Dry mouth_ indigestion_ tingles_ brain zaps.
Comments: Sometimes it works great other times_ not so much. The more I dose daily_ the more "out of it" I feel - but sometimes I need that. I like that it can be taken as needed as well as daily to help keep me calm. Not sure if I need a higher dosage or change of medication all together.I would recommend trying this before jumping into highly addictive Benzo's.

Side Effects: sleepiness_tired_prickly feeling like electric shocks_dizziness_lightheadedness_a little emotional on 25 mgs 3 times a day. I am taking the generic brand.
Comments: Instead of taking klonopin which gets abused easily and my brother was after my klonopins when i was on it. I was told to get off it and see if the electric shocks like prickly feeling goes away but today is hard on me because not taking any medicine for my anxiety.  I feel off it that i don't know if i can survive off it and going off 25 mgs is hard on me. Should i ask to be put back on it or what? What should i do? I am on day 1 of not taking the medication.

Side Effects: The only side effect I have experienced is the look of disbelief from a nurse who insists I can't be allergic to benedryl and that she/he has never heard of Atarax.
Comments: What a shame that more hospitals aren't aware of the intolerance that some of us have for benedryl. Benedryl does nothing for me. It increases the allergic reaction I am experiencing and puts my body into a state as if I was hooked-up to a full strength caffeine IV drip! Atarax_ however_ saves the day.. at least if I can convince the health professional that some people are allergic to benedryl and all histamine blockers are not the same.

Reason: My toddler takes it for allergies
Side Effects: If I give her less then the prescribed amount of 10mg 3 times per day_ it helps with the drowsiness. I usually give her half of that.
Comments: It has helped my daughter a great deal. She still has extreme eczema but it has worked well for her hives. It has cut down on the amount of scratching and she no longer scratches to the point of bleeding all over her sheets at night. Her quality of life has greatly improved.

Side Effects: At first I noticed it was hard to swallow.  But that side effect disappeared. Maybe a little sleepy.
Comments: I was prescribed 25 mg of Atarax when I went cold turkey off of valium which I had been taking for years.  This pill seems to help with anxiety issues.  I am only taking 10 mg at a time because of the sleepy issues.  I am doing fine. Nothing bad to say.

Side Effects: Drowsiness
Comments: I honestly cannot much difference between this drug and Valium_ Klonopin or Xanax. I have to take a lot of it (up to 100 mgs 4x a day) but it works well. I am not that bothered by the drowsiness and I welcome it over climbing the walls.I took benzodiazepines off and on for 25 years. After my 5th withdrawal experience_ I have vowed never to go on them again. God willing_ I will not. Atarax saved me. I have read that it is not meant for long-term (more than 4 months) use and it may lose effectiveness after that time_ but I have taken it off and on for 4 years and it still works. A word about the weight gain claims- I really think it is impossible for an antihistamine to make you fat. There is absolutely no literature to support this.

Side Effects: When I first started taking it I was very groggy and had dry mouth for a couple weeks.  It does take a while for your body to adjust.  Now I occassionally experience grogginess only if I take a higher dose than usual for a few hours the next morning.
Comments: I couldn't get by without this medication.  It took over a year for doctors to figure out what would work for me.  Now I only need to take one 25mg dose before bed and that's it.  If I forget by late afternoon the next day I start getting the itching and hayfever symptoms.  I have to take it every day and use generic.  I'm glad to hear no one is experiencing any long term effects.

Side Effects: I didn't even think it was the atarax until I started reading other feedback_ but I have gained about 6 lbs in three months.  Also_ I experienced the dry mouth and heart flutters the first week_ but that went away.
Comments: I haven't had a panic attack in over a month now and that is a big deal since I used to have at least 3 or 4 a week.  It is working_ but I am not thrilled about the weight gain.  Maybe I will see how I do without it for a while and if the panic attacks return I will restart.  I am also on Zoloft and Trazodone for OCD_ Depression_ and Insomnia.

Side Effects: When I increase my dosage at the beginning of the allergy season I feel a bit more sleepy_ but then my body adjusts and I am just fine.
Comments: My allergist started me on Hydroxyzine for my severe allergies during a time of extreme crisis in my life. I took 50mg 4x/day. Now I take 50mg as needed for sleep and clear breathing at night and take 4x/day during the allergy season. I love that it has no "discontinuation" issues and not at all addictive. This drug has been around for decades and has been shown to have no permanent side effects.

Side Effects: very tired  and grogy in the morning_ increased appetite_ deep sleep_ anxiety relief as well even at 10 mgs  helped with the hives for now.
This drug made my daughter CRAZY.
Comments: My 3 year old daughter was prescibed Atarax and was ask to take this drug an hour before her dentist appointment to calm her.  This drug had a total opposite effect.  We were not warned by her dentist of the side effects.  It made her crazy and scared.  We only gave her half of the dosage prescribed and her adverse reaction lasted for hours.  I will not be returning to this dentist and I do not think this drug should be prescibed to anyone.

Side Effects: nothing now_ but at first it was drawsiness
Comments: I started with 250mg daily and withing 2 wks reduced the dosage to half of a 25 mg per day. I have been using the generic pill (Hydroxine HCL) for 30 years. I have experimented with other pills_ but nothing worked as well as this one.My allergy comes like a clockwork and I know when to take the pill. You need to reduce the dosage until you find what works for you. That way_ the drwsiness will go away.

Side Effects: Knocks me out_ tired even the next day_ very hungry leads to weight gain
Comments: All this aside_ it's the only medication that works on my hives. I've stopped taking it daily and now cut the 25mg pill in half and take when I start to itch_ which helps with the drowsiness so I can function_ but still very tired. Will ask my dr. if I can get a lower dosage on refill. Taking it twice a day did not help frequency or severity of outbreaks_ so I now take only at first sign of itching. I have not found it to prevent hives_ only satiate them.

Side Effects: So Sleepy.
Comments: In the words of Denis Leary_ "Don't make any f***ing plans..." Too tired to care whether the itching had stopped - maybe that's the point.

Reason: Took it for a severe case of hives
Side Effects: I had NO side effects at all. Only benefits
Comments: I had severe hives all over my body for a full month..not an inch that wasn't welted. No idea of why and not allergic to things. Finally I was given Atarax and with one pill within 24 hrs they were 95% gone (what relief)!! I took one more and I was fine. It did make me sleepy but it like a miracle!!! Never got that again_ TG. I could have kissed that doctor who gave it to me.  I was so full of scratches & sores from the unbearable itch_ it was horrible and nothing gave me relief till the Atarax.

Side Effects: For the most part_ my hives behave on Atarax. I am Extremely tired and difficult to wake up in the morning. Feel like only doing 1/2 of what I used to do....but there is nothing else that will stop me from the hives :(
Comments: This has been the only drug that has taken care of the hives. I tried Zyrtec_ doxepin_ and a combo of a bunch of different allergy meds. Only when I was on atarax did I find that I didnt have hives_ itch_ and have huge red marks from something touching my body. Unfortunately_ I cant get back to the energy level I was before all this started.

Side Effects: Initially I was given too high a dose_ and very briefly experienced some confusion; but once the optimum dose for me was found (about 30-50 mg per day) there was some drowsiness and occasional dryness in the mouth.
Comments: It was highly effective in countering previously intense itching. The physician who prescribed Atarax (in hospital) very soon found an effective dose that suppressed the itching without causing confusion.

Side Effects: mild drowsiness_ dry mouth_ hoarseness
Comments: I have tried atarax(20-30 gms/day)on and off for several years for a contact dermatitis condition of unknown cause_ which causes severe itchy skin. When it has worked it reduces itchiness to a more bearable level. It does not make the itchiness completely go away. Sometimes I have tried it with no success at all.Dry mouth and hoarseness are some of the side effects. The only way I have found of reducing these side effects is to stop taking the atarax.

Side Effects: Barely any - It doesn't even make me sleepy... prehaps a little pleasantly light-headed_ but I can function at 120%.
Comments: What an amazing solution to Eczema. Since I regularly use Atarax for my skin condition_ it seems that the hayfever_ which I used to get and soothe with over-the-counter antihistamines_ is now a thing of the past given a side-effect of Eczema is that you get a package-deal that silences ALL your mild allergies.

Side Effects: taken at about 9pm_I was still drowsy in the morning.It has a more potent effect with a can or two of beer.I would not dare to drive after taking it_and have cut down to a quarter of a tablet and will try tonight to do without anything to see if it helps me not to be dizzy_and head-aches_in the morning.I take prednisolone for asthma_and if I am on a high dose the drug helps me to sleep.
Comments: I think anybody being prescribed this drug_should be prepared to go to bed_in case it has adverse effects

Side Effects: Puts me to sleep. No other side effects.
Comments: I've been taking this drug for eczema for a long time on and off. When I have an episode with the eczema its worst at night_ so the atarax helps me sleep without all the itching. I don't take it everynight. Only as needed. I was very miserable before I started taking it. Its been a Godsend for me.

Side Effects: After about an hour_ my heart went into tachycardia and I swelled up like a giant_ plump tomato.  My skin was extremely hot to the touch_ especially my face and the tops of my legs.  Had to get to the ER and get IV steroids and Benadryl to counteract.  This stuff is dangerous!
Comments: I would not recommend taking this without some liquid Benadryl on hand.

Side Effects: None_ except possibly some tiredness. No 14 hour nights like some people describe though (thankfully).
Comments: Barely helped me at all. I started with 25mg when needed_ didn't help_ neither did 37.5mg. I then got the advice to take it at regular intervals_ 25mg every four hours_ that didn't help noticably either.I hear that it's great for others stuff (like hives)_ though.

Reason: Anxiety and to help me sleep
Side Effects: No side effects apart from a little sleepy.
Comments: I have taken Atarax one 20 mg in the evening one hour before bedtime_to help me sleep_ as I was suffering with anxiety.  Having a bout of panic attacks and anxiety again at the moment_ so I take my 20 mg a little earlier about tea time to calm me down_ as the anxiety tightens my chest_ which in turn knocks my balance and I become giddy and I hypoventilate.  To relieve my bouts of anxiety_ (and years ago I did get it anxiety bad_ and had trouble going out_ dont want to go there again)_ I get plenty of rest (with the help of Atarax_ exercise_ lavender baths_ talking to somebody_ try to reduce worry_ let problems go over your head_ or laugh at them!

Side Effects: Extreme sleepiness and grogginess_ even up to 48 hours after taking this junk
Comments: It made me like a drunk driver!  If I take it at bedtime on Sunday night_ ALL of Monday is likely to be shot_ and possibly some or even all of Tuesday!  I was also very prone to lots of mistakes and memory loss_ even at age 20!  These effects got WORSE over the years and then took two years to get it out of my brain after I stopped taking it!  It do well_ however_ for the itching and hives.  Due to screwing up my brain_ it (Atarax) can just SIT IN THE FIRE!

Side Effects: mouth dryness

Modest Drowsyness when doubling the maximum dose...My doc told me to take maximumly 30 mg's per night of use.Only at 60-70 mg it helped me fall asleep. But not to remain at sleep. This is a waste of cash_ and i'm sticking with mine to see if there might be some effects some other time.
Comments: Atarax is a waste of cash_ does nothing. Only maybe helped me with falling asleep by 5% or so..

Side Effects: Drowsiness
Comments: Very pleased.  Sleep well at night and don't wake up itching anymore.  Gives me wierd dreams.

Side Effects: Weight gain (5lbs/month)_ drowsiness_ headache_ hypersomnia_ muscle weakness_ dizziness_ dry mouth
Comments: Significant reduction in allergy symptoms_ shortness of breath_ hives_ nighttime itching etc_ but side-effects are extremely debilitating. I would not be able to work whilst on this drug_ then again_ I was unable to work due to severity of intial allergy symptoms and tend to be hypersensitive to all prescribed medication.

Side Effects: weight gain 5lbs in 1 month_ I felt more anxiety during the day after taking 1/2 pill at night_ shortness of breath_ bloating
Comments: I slept well and felt rested the next day_ great for insomnia_ but im not sure it can be used long term. I may go herbal

Side Effects: Dry Mouth
Comments: Atarax works great for mild to moderate anxiety (doesn't help severe with me).  For insomnia it helps get to and stay asleep unless severe anxiety exists... and at the worst_ your very relaxed and at least able to rest.  For itching it works and hives it seems to work pretty well.The plus is that it's not addictive like Xanax_ Ativan_ etc. and that it's fairly safe from what I've read/my Dr. has told me.  I use it as needed.  It's nice to know there is something you can get for anxiety from your doctor without a whole lot of hassle.

Side Effects: DRY MOUTH
Comments: I HAVE TAKEN ATARAX MOST OF MY CHILDHOOD AND MOST OF MY ADULT LIFE.. IT IS A LIFE SAVER.. I AM NOW TAKING VISTIRIL_ BECAUSE THE DOCTOR I AM SEEING CAN GET ME THE VISTIRIL FREE FROM THE COMPANY. VISTIRIL IS THE SAME THING AS ATARAX. I DONT THINK I WILL EVER BE WITHOUT IT.

Side Effects: puffy stomach_WEIGHT GAIN.._next day very tired needed to take 2-3 hour naps in middle of the day
Comments: weight gain with stomach and back fat

Side Effects: puffy stomach_WEIGHT GAIN.._next day very tired needed to take 2-3 hour naps in middle of the day
Comments: weight gain with stomach and back fat

Side Effects: sleepiness sluggish
side effects: background headache and sleepiness
Comments: This medicine made me feel more like a woman_ and that would be fine except I am a man and admitting that is fine as long as I don't say that outloud_ that would be embarrasing.

Side Effects: WOREST EVER!!! I was dizzy_ screaming crying_ server allergy to this drug!!! BE READY JUST INCASE!!!
I had the best sleep I've experienced for years! I do feel a little sluggish the next morning_ but this tends to wear off as the day goes on.
Comments: As a chronic insomniac_ I've tried virtually everything in an effort to get a good night's sleep.  Conventional sleeping tablets either don't work_ give me rebound insomnia when I stop taking them_ or make me feel so awful the next day that it simply isn't worth it.  Purely by chance I discovered that Atarax works like a charm for me  -  8 or more hours of deep_ restful sleep.  I don't take it every night as I suspect that the effect would wear off.  Also_ it isn't recommended for people with early signs of glaucoma_ such as raised intra-ocular pressure_ which my opthalmologist is monitoring me for.  I just keep this wonderful pill as a sure-fire cure when I can't handle the insomnia any longer.

Side Effects: The main side effect I experienced was sleepiness.  Produced a 'cloudy' feeling in the morning_ making it extemely difficult to wake up.  Easily slept very deeply for 10 - 14 hours a night.
Comments: It definately worked to ease my night sweats! I never wake up needing to change my clothes or the sheets anymore_ ever!  I'd also give it a rating of 5 as a sleeping pill.

Side Effects: The main side effect I experienced was sleepiness.  Produced a 'cloudy' feeling in the morning_ making it extemely difficult to wake up.  Easily slept very deeply for 10 - 14 hours a night.
Comments: It definately worked to ease my night sweats! I never wake up needing to change my clothes or the sheets anymore_ ever!  I'd also give it a rating of 5 as a sleeping pill.

Side Effects: No side affects that I can remember_ maybe a sluggish metabolism.
Comments: I take 1 25mg. pill every 3 days or so.  If I don't take them I break out in hives all over my body. This pill has been a lifesaver for me and I couldn't live without it.

Side Effects: I was a child then_ but from what my mother and other relatives told me was that within a week I had ballooned.  I got a huge stomach_ and also seem to get man breasts.  Which research I've been doing says that it goes back to the thyroid gland.  I suspect that Atarax messed up the function of my thyroid.
Comments: My mother discontinued use after the third dose or something like that_ too late the damage was done.  I've struggled with weight all my life_ while my sisters had no problems_ they might actually have been on the too skinny side_ all this cosidering my birth weight was lower than both of theirs.  I would appreciate any feedback if anyone else has had similiar experiences.

Side Effects: sleep/sleepyness
Comments: Didn't work for me_ but as a sleeping pill I'd give it a 5. The plus side to this medicine is that its non addictive.

Side Effects: Nothing bad or serious.  Made me VERY tired and sleepy (which was to be expected).  I slept very deeply while taking it_ which was good_ because the hives kept me awake from the itching.  Sometimes I woke up with a minor headache. Gave me brain fog and felt a little
Comments: I would definitely take it again_ if the need arose.

Side Effects: sleepiness_ muscle weakness_ slow weight gain
Comments: stopping the medication all at once caused insomnia_ itchy skin_ general

Side Effects: works wonders for me
Comments: I take the generic form-it is cheaper- it is one of the only things I can take to help me sleep

Side Effects: none
Comments: didnt help at all even at 75 mgs.

Side Effects: very drowsy (first few doses)
Comments: seems to help with anxiety_ as far as allergy relieve I can't tell..seems to help a little.in general anti-histimines don't work at all for me so this was sort of a last ditch effort. First few times I took it it put me to sleep like I'd been hit by a train...but that wore off.

Side Effects: Initially Atarax helped for my hives_ but after taking 4 25mg each day_ then 8 a day_ then more and more_ my hives still came out all over my body....It's like my body wanted more and more Atarax.....so then I went on Prednisone....and then Doxepin

I fell asleep very quickly.. almost like a zombie state_ I mean instantly with a 25mg pill.  Caused me to sleep almost 14 hrs. I since learned if I quartered them it worked fine for a normal 8 hrs sleep.  But it is wonderful and gave me relief almost immediately when NOTHING else helped. Also excellent to use for inflammation of various types (mucuous membrane) to halt histamine production.
Comments: Apparently my physician thought the hives were caused by anxiety which it's also good for.  I'd had them a month_ no known trigger and nothing else gave me relief and the Atarax worked like a miracle!! thank goodness.
